summary: SummaryDior Addict Lip GlowLip Balm is where makeup meets lip care offering the perfect blend of color and hydration. Now available in an extended shade range of cool and new warm undertones, the same iconic pH activated formula delivers a sheer radiant glow and 48H hydration*.
details: DetailsBenefitsA hydrating lip balm infused with a unique technology that adapts to the pH of lips to reveal custom color & a natural-looking glow. Featuring cherry extract & shea butter, Dior Addict Lip Glow hydrates lips for 48 hours*, leaving them visibly smoother for 8 hours**.FeaturesCoverage: SheerFinish: High ShineItem 2633558How To UseApply additional coats of this lip balm directly to lips to achieve your desired look, from a subtle tinted glow to more intense color.Ingredients077 Candy: Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Behenyl Behenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Diisostearyl Malate, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ethyl Vanillin, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propyl Gallate. May Contain: CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 45370 (Orange 5), CI 77491, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply additional coats of this lip balm directly to lips to achieve your desired look, from a subtle tinted glow to more intense color.

reviews.headline: Overpriced
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm a loyal aquaphor gal because I suffer from perioral dermatitis. I'm very picky about my lip balms and thought this product in this shade was meh. Did it keep my lips moist? Yes. However, it didn't really do much for my lips colorwise. For the price point, ill just stick to my aquaphor stick.

reviews.headline: So Bad
reviews.comments: I am struggling to find why there is hype with this product.  It is basically over priced lip balm with hardly and color.

reviews.headline: Overpriced Chapstick
reviews.comments: I was sent this product for free to review. The color I chose was pretty but it wasn't glossy enough for me.

reviews.headline: Lips but better
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  I loved this product. It's definitely your lips but better in terms of color. Beautiful packing and it's my daily use item.

reviews.headline: Feels so luxe! ‚ú®
reviews.comments:
This Lip Balm feels so luxe! üíÑ The texture is buttery smooth and melts into the lips, leaving them soft and naturally tinted. I love the light, pleasant scent and chic packaging, though the price is definitely a little splurge.
I received this product in exchange for my honest review for Dior.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love how it smells and how is easy to carry with me all the times .. keep my lips hydrated and beautiful ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è I love it so much and color is my favorite thing

reviews.headline: Beautiful, Moisturizing Lip Balm
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging is stunning. The lip balm is a beautiful pink, but not too overwhelming. A great but subtle pop of color. The lip balm smells good and it's a very moisturizing formula. Thoroughly enjoy this product!

reviews.headline: Natural GLOW!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My fav lip product! It enhances your natural lip color, it's super soft and smells great. The packaging is super cute but I find that the lid can fall off easy when in warmer temperatures.

reviews.headline: I love this stuff. I wish I didn't
reviews.comments: I an hooked on this lip balm.  I love the shade berry.  It really shows up on the lips so I often wear this instead of lipstick.  It is more moisturizing than the fresh brand, which used to be my go. I just wish it wasn't so expensive considering I wear it almost daily.  Definitely try it in store first to get a shade that shows up on your lips.  I don't think I would pay this amount of money if it wasn't noticeable.
Perfect lip balm

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Packaging was nice! I didn't really notice how it smelled, but it looked pretty nice. It took quite a few applications. The texture was nice, but it smeared a bit.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Stunning Color & Design
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Absolutely in love with the Dior Addict Lip Glow in 075! The finish is smooth and not too matte or glossy, and texture is great. Huge fan of the design as well!

reviews.headline: Pigmented
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The color is vibrant, darker shade perfect for fall. It's matte finish. It goes on smooth. Does stain a bit but that's due to the dark shade. Would keep this in rotation.

reviews.headline: Nothing to complain
reviews.comments: It is a total winner in my book! Not only does it have elegant packaging, but it also smells amazing. The formula is super smooth and hydrating, making it perfect for daily wear. The subtle color adds a fresh touch to my lips without looking too bold or artificial. Yes, it's on the pricier side, but trust me, it's worth every penny - the quality and performance are top-notch!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love this product! It is great color. It goes with anything and everything! Its lightweight so that a bonus!

reviews.headline: This was just ok.
reviews.comments: I was really expecting something special because I had seen this recommended like it was the best thing ever.  It was ok.  It had more of a waxy feel to it, which is not what I was expecting from a high end brand & for the price.  I will use it up, but will not be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love it!

reviews.headline: pricey but a holy grail
reviews.comments: I always see negative reviews because of the simplicity and price but I was gifted this years ago and keep coming back to it. It's one of the only balm sticks that actually stays on my lips without being too oily or ineffective.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It's very moisturizing! I love that is adds just a touch of color to my lips and not dark and doesn't stand out as much as a lipstick. It has a sweet smell to it which I absolutely love!

reviews.headline: my summer go to!
reviews.comments: This is a great lip balm! The color is very sheer and comfortable to wear. The balm is scented and probably has peppermint oil. The packaging is very sleek and heavy.

The best lip balm I have ever tried

faceoff_positive.comments:
For years, I've been on a quest for the perfect everyday lip product ‚Äì something that hydrates, enhances my natural lip color, and feels comfortable all day long. My search finally ended when I discovered Dior Addict Lip Glow in 000 Universal Clear. It's not just a lip balm; it's a transformative experience for your lips.

From the moment you hold the sleek, iconic Dior packaging, you know you're in for something special. The pale pink tube with its silver Dior logo is undeniably chic and feels luxurious in your hand. But the real magic happens when you apply the product.

000 Universal Clear appears as a pale pink balm in the tube, but it's truly a chameleon. It reacts to your unique lip chemistry, creating a custom shade of pink that perfectly complements your skin tone. On me, it transforms into a beautiful, natural-looking rosy pink that instantly brightens my complexion. It's not a bold, dramatic color, but rather a subtle, healthy flush that makes my lips look naturally fuller and more defined.

The texture is where this lip glow truly shines. It's incredibly smooth and glides effortlessly onto the lips, providing instant hydration. It's not sticky or greasy, but rather a lightweight, balm-like texture that feels incredibly comfortable. Unlike some lip balms that disappear within an hour, Dior Lip Glow provides long-lasting hydration that keeps my lips feeling soft and supple for hours. I find myself reaching for it constantly, not just for the color, but for the luxurious feel.

What truly sets Dior Lip Glow apart is its ability to enhance the natural beauty of your lips. It doesn't just add color; it seems to plump and smooth the lips, minimizing the appearance of fine lines and creating a more youthful, healthy look. It's like a filter for your lips, instantly perfecting them with a subtle, yet noticeable, glow.

Here's a breakdown of what I love about Dior Addict Lip Glow in 000 Universal Clear:

*   **Custom Color:** Adapts to your unique lip chemistry for a personalized shade of pink.
*   **Intense Hydration:** Provides long-lasting moisture, keeping lips soft and supple.
*   **Smooth Texture:** Glides on effortlessly and feels incredibly comfortable.
*   **Natural Enhancement:** Plumps, smooths, and perfects the lips for a healthy, youthful look.
*   **Luxurious Packaging:** The iconic Dior packaging is both chic and practical.
*   **Long-lasting wear:** The hydration and subtle color last for hours, requiring minimal reapplication.

While the price point is definitely higher than your average lip balm, I truly believe that Dior Lip Glow is worth the investment. It's more than just a cosmetic product; it's a luxurious treat for your lips that provides both immediate and long-term benefits. If you're looking for a lip product that hydrates, enhances your natural beauty, and feels absolutely divine, I highly recommend giving Dior Addict Lip Glow in 000 Universal Clear a try. It's become an absolute staple in my makeup bag, and I can't imagine my daily routine without it. It's the perfect everyday lip product for anyone who wants to achieve naturally beautiful, healthy-looking lips.
faceoff_positive.headline: Fantastic product

faceoff_negative.comments: I was able to sample this product for my honest review. Underwhelming is the word that comes to mind when trying this Dior product, and that is due to multiple reasons. Packaging wise, the lipstick tube looks great with the iconic Dior emblazoned in silver but the lipstick tube feels like cheap plastic. There is no weight to this tube and it feels like the plastic could easily break. Reading the ingredients, Dior's lip glow is made with sunflower and sweet cherry oils as well as Shea butter, promising hydration for 48 hours. I have to say, the lip product did not feel like it coated my lips. I've had more hydration from other lip products. Dior also promises color changing to a rosy pink but I honestly did not see any change in color. Perhaps this is due to my color being 203 citrus, a yellow neutral tint. Fragrance wise, Dior added vanillin to their formula but it smells just like lip balms I can purchase at my drugstore. But after repeated use, I did feel hydration, even in this cold weather. All in all, I do think there was care into developing the balm but the price does not match what other balms offer at the same price point. It's good but worth it is up to the buyer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nourishing for cold weather but falls short in other ways
